roleset.name: work as a waitress
roleset.note: WAITRESS-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on Call Home, internet. No VNcls. (from waitress.01-v)

example.name: both args- transitive
example.text: She waitressed night shifts while her kids slept out in the diner's parking lot.
example.arg: while her kids slept out in the diner's parking lot

example.name: intransitive
example.text: It was very hard remember when-1 we were waitressing *trace*-1
